topics.body:
"@HJSDGCE":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5568327063687256272c5a00#post_5568327063687256272c5a00
Because some people like to show superiority over others. Most bullies are victims of bullying themselves.

Example: Pre-WW1 Germany and its allies were the whipping boys of Europe. They had enough and thus came WW1. They lost, however, and made a deal with the devil so to speak. Then they tried getting back at their assailants.

You see don't go bullying others, else they'll take over France.
topics.author: 52f0834d63687261cba90300
